availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Gabriel Winter Price, Sr. (Clay County, Kentucky, court clerk.)

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, court clerk. Boone County, Kentucky, native. Married to Eliza Ann Garrard Price on November 11, 1824. Father of Robert Price, William Price, Matthew Price, Edward Price, Ann M. Price, Theophilus Price, and Gabriel W. Price, Jr. Brick mason in Clay County in 1850. Clerk in Clay County in 1860. Employed Margaret Clark as a servant in Clay County in 1860. Clerk of the Clay County Court and Clay Circuit Court from 1861 to 1865.
